text: The Tour du Loir-et-Cher is a cycling stage race that takes place in the Loir- et-Cher region of France. The race traditionally starts and finishes in the capital of Blois. Since at least 2009, the final stage has consisted of a 12-lap circuit race totaling 97.5 km. It is rated as a 2.2 race as part of the UCI Europe Tour. The race first took place in 1960. == Past winners == == References == == External links == * Category:UCI Europe Tour races Category:Cycle races in France Category:Recurring sporting events established in 1960
title: Tour du Loir-et-Cher
